description: R. M. D. Wasantha Vs Nimal Abeysiri, District Secretary of Polonnaruwa and eight others. before Hon. K.M.G.H. Kulatunga, J.
parties: R. M. D. Wasantha Vs Nimal Abeysiri, District Secretary of Polonnaruwa and eight others.
keywords: • Succession to LDO grants • Cancellation of grants • Proprietary rights • Rules of natural justice • Audi alteram partem • Failure of succession (Section 68 LDO) • Ultra vires • Delay does not defeat a nullity
legistation: • Article 140 of the Constitution of Sri Lanka – writ jurisdiction. • Land Development Ordinance (LDO), No. 19 of 1935 (as amended): - Section 19 (4) & 19 (6) – issue of grants. - Section 68 – failure of succession. - Section 104 (pre-amendment) – cancellation of grants by President. - Sections 104A–104D (inserted by Act No. 11 of 2022) – new procedure for cancellation. Sections 104–118A, Chapter VIII – cancellation of grants and permits.
